verses.verse: O <WG5599> foolish <WG453> Galatians <WG1052>, who <WG5101> has bewitched <WG940> you <WG5209>, that you should <WG3982> not <WG3361> obey <WG3982> the truth <WG225>, before <WG2596> whose <WG3739> eyes <WG3788> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> has been evidently set forth <WG4270>, crucified <WG4717> among <WG1722> you <WG5213>?

Have you suffered <WG3958> so many things <WG5118> in vain <WG1500>? If <WG1489> it is indeed <WG2532> in vain <WG1500>.

So then <WG5620> they <WG2127> which are <WG3588> of <WG1537> faith <WG4102> are blessed <WG2127> with <WG4862> faithful <WG4103> Abraham <WG11>.

For <WG1063> as many as <WG3745> are <WG1526> of <WG1537> the works <WG2041> of the law <WG3551> are <WG1526> under <WG5259> the curse <WG2671>: for <WG1063> it is written <WG1125>, Cursed <WG1944> is every one <WG3956> that <WG3739> continues <WG1696> not <WG3756> in <WG1722> all things <WG3956> which <WG3588> are written <WG1125> in <WG1722> the book <WG975> of the law <WG3551> to do <WG4160> them <WG846>.

But <WG1161> that <WG3754> no man <WG3762> is justified <WG1344> by <WG1722> the law <WG3551> in the sight of <WG3844> God <WG2316>, is evident <WG1212>: for <WG3754>, The just <WG1342> shall live <WG2198> by <WG1537> faith <WG4102>.

Christ <WG5547> has redeemed <WG1805> us <WG2248> from <WG1537> the curse <WG2671> of the law <WG3551>, being made <WG1096> a curse <WG2671> for <WG5228> us <WG2257>: for <WG1063> it is written <WG1125>, Cursed <WG1944> is every one <WG3956> that <WG3588> hangs <WG2910> on <WG1909> a tree <WG3586>:

And <WG1161> this <WG5124> I say <WG3004>, that the covenant <WG1242>, that was confirmed before <WG4300> of <WG5259> God <WG2316> in <WG1519> Christ <WG5547>, the law <WG3551>, which <WG3588> was <WG1096> four hundred <WG5071> and <WG2532> thirty <WG5144> years <WG2094> after <WG3326>, cannot <WG3756> annul <WG1519>, that <WG3588> it should make <WG2673> the promise <WG1860> of no effect <WG2673>.

Therefore <WG5101> then <WG3767> why is the law <WG3551>? Therefore <WG5620> the law <WG3551> was <WG1096> our <WG2257> schoolmaster <WG3807> to bring us unto <WG1519> Christ <WG5547>, that <WG2443> we might be justified <WG1344> by <WG1537> faith <WG4102>.
But <WG1161> now that <WG3588> faith <WG4102> is come <WG2064>, we are <WG2070> no longer <WG3765> under <WG5259> a schoolmaster <WG3807>.
For <WG1063> you are <WG2075> all <WG3956> the sons <WG5207> of God <WG2316> by <WG1223> faith <WG4102> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>.
For <WG1063> as many <WG3745> of you <WG907> as <WG3745> have been baptized <WG907> into <WG1519> Christ <WG5547> have put on <WG1746> Christ <WG5547>.

There is <WG1762> neither <WG3756> Jew <WG2453> nor <WG3761> Greek <WG1672>, there is <WG1762> neither <WG3756> bond <WG1401> nor <WG3761> free <WG1658>, there is <WG1762> neither <WG3756> male <WG730> nor <WG2532> female <WG2338>: for <WG1063> you <WG5210> are <WG2075> all <WG3956> one <WG1520> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>.
And <WG1161> if <WG1487> you <WG5210> are Christ <WG5547>'s, then <WG686> you <WG2075> are Abraham <WG11>'s seed <WG4690>, and <WG2532> heirs <WG2818> according to <WG2596> the promise <WG1860>.
